rationale: Specifies weekly INR checks and states "until things stabilize," but does not document a specific lab order or follow-up appointment.
Links increased monitoring to recent dietary changes but does not cite evidence-based guidelines explicitly.
Provides phone-alarm reminder but omits pill-organizer counseling.
No documentation that daughter assists with appointments or other social context.
Completely omits warfarin safety counseling (bleeding signs, missed doses, when to seek care).
Note is brief and focused; only minor duplication of phrasing, minimal irrelevant content.
